 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שָׁחַד‎</span>] **verb** ==give a present, bribe== ([[Eccl.35.14|Eccl 35:14]] Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שְׁחַד‎</span>, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***bribe***; perhaps also Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***šidê***</u></abbr>, ***gifts***, [[BDB#Dl|Dl]]<sup>WB 643</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Imperfect*** 2 feminine singular, accusative of person <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַתִּשְׁחֳדִי אוֺתָם‎</span> [[Ezek.16.33|Ezek 16:33]] ***thou didst bribe them*** to come (<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָבוֺא‎</span>; \|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָתַן נְדָנִים‎</span>); read probably also ***Infinitive construct*** suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁחֲדָהּ‎</span> [[Isa.47.11|Isa 47:11]] ***to buy it off*** (for [[BDB#MT|ᵑ0]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שַׁחְרָהּ‎</span>, so Kr [[BDB#Gr|Gr]] [[BDB#Buhl|Buhl]] [[BDB#Che|Che]]<sup>Hpt Heb 142</sup>, compare [[BDB#Marti|Marti]]; see [[Prov.6.35|Prov 6:35]]); ***Imperative*** masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שִׁחֲדוּ בַעֲדִי‎</span> ([[BDB#Ges|Ges]]<sup>«GKC:64a»§ 64a</sup>) [[Job.6.22|Job 6:22]] ***give a bribe for me.***
